summary: In 1929, the film follows the six-year old son of a Swedish country doctor. Åke lives with his parents and his sister Aja in a small provincial town. His best friend is Kalle Nubb. Åke is ... See full summary »
cast: Martin Lindström|Loa Falkman|Gunnel Fred|Katja Blomquist|Ulla Sjöblom|Suzanne Ernrup|Björn Gustafson|Alexander Skarsgård|Stellan Skarsgård|Allan Edwall|Elisabeth Fahlén-Lee|Raymond Nederström|Per Olof Eriksson|Marianne Stjernqvist|Ernst Günther|Lena Lindgren|David Boati|Gunnar Bergström|Carl-Axel Elfving|Carl-Ivar Nilsson|Johanna Sandquist|Carl Henrik Widlund|Louisa Kihlberg|Johan Böös|Anna Malmqvist|Ingrid Fröberg|Christine Schiött-Quist|Karl Gustav Siik|Anna Bergman

title: Ake y su mundo
